description: This file implements a function 'runInSandbox' that creates a hidden sandboxed iframe, executes JavaScript code inside it, and handles messaging and timeout events for sandbox execution management.

methods.name: runInSandbox({ container, code, onMessage, onComplete, onTimeout, onError })
methods.description: Creates a sandboxed iframe, executes provided JavaScript code within it, manages message passing, and handles timeout scenarios.

ctags.name: runInSandbox
